name: part_000
file: tmp_【新衣装3Dお披露目】AZKi 6th Anniversary Live ＂百花繚乱＂【#AZKi新衣装3Dライブ】 [bHXB9qI2olE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro graphic and countdown for AZKi's 6th Anniversary Live "Hyakka Ryouran".
AZKi starts her performance with the song 'Bansanka'.

subtitles.original:
晩餐歌
作詞・作曲 tuki.
subtitles.english:
Bansanka
Lyrics & Composition by tuki.

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから だから一緒には居れないな
subtitles.english: I'll make you cry, so I can't stay with you.

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから 早く忘れて欲しいんだ
subtitles.english: I'll make you cry, so I want you to forget me quickly.

subtitles.original: 人間だからね たまには違うものも食べたいね
subtitles.english: Since we're human, we want to eat something different once in a while.

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから そう君を泣かすから
subtitles.english: Because I'll make you cry, yes, I'll make you cry.

subtitles.original: でも味気ないないないないんだよね
subtitles.english: But it's so dull and tasteless.

subtitles.original: 会いたいなんなんだよね
subtitles.english: I just want to see you.

subtitles.original: 君以外会いたくないんだよね
subtitles.english: I don't want to see anyone but you.

subtitles.original: なんて勝手だね
subtitles.english: How selfish of me.

subtitles.original: 大体曖昧なんなんだよね
subtitles.english: Everything is just so vague.

subtitles.original: 愛の存在証明なんて
subtitles.english: Something like a proof of love's existence...

subtitles.original: 君が教えてくれないか
subtitles.english: Won't you tell me?

subtitles.original: 何十回の夜を過ごしたって得られないような
subtitles.english: Something I can't obtain even after spending dozens of nights...

subtitles.original: 愛してるを並べてみて
subtitles.english: Try lining up "I love you"s.

subtitles.original: 何十回の夜を過ごしたって得られないような
subtitles.english: Something I can't obtain even after spending dozens of nights...

subtitles.original: 最高のフルコースを頂戴
subtitles.english: Give me the best full-course meal.

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから きっと一生は無理だよね
subtitles.english: I'll make you cry, so a lifetime together is probably impossible.

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから 胸がとても痛むんだ
subtitles.english: Because I'll make you cry, my heart aches so much.

subtitles.original: 人間だからね たまには分かり合えなくなって
subtitles.english: Since we're human, sometimes we can't understand each other.

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから また君を泣かすから
subtitles.english: I'll make you cry, I'll make you cry again.

subtitles.original: でも自信がないないないないんだよね
subtitles.english: But I have no confidence at all.

subtitles.original: 変わりたくないないないないんだよね
subtitles.english: I don't want to change at all.
